ygData.subject: Re: Humble youth seeking enlightenemt
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *** Befallen is easily reached if you exit freeport from the west gate, then make sure you have the wall on your lefthand side, zone 2 times and then after
ygData.messageBody:
>
>From: AzerothJS@...
>
>I hope you kind sirs will pardon the unspeakable ignorance of a young lad
>such as myself. I have seven questions:
>
>1. How do you know when you are maxed at a skill?

*** Level *5 +5 ie a level 10 player has 55 as max

>
>2. Where are Najena and Befallen?

*** Befallen is easily reached if you exit freeport from the west
gate, then make sure you have the wall on your lefthand side,
zone 2 times and then after a short while you will se a litup cave
entrance, thats the entrance. note that you will pass a large
opening in the sand and thats the entrance to north karanas.

Consult your map about najena
>
>3. What should a level six Barbarian be doing with his limited >amounts of
>time?

*** Go to bb (black burrow) but be carefull, If you are you will have
no problem advancing. Go for the scrawny gnolls and be carefull
There are HUGE trains in bb, probably the worst in the game,
but its worth it, IMHO

>
>4. How is experience divided in a group? Is it the same amout as solo,
>split
>into shares, or is there more total experience given out?

*** The higher the level the more xp. a level 15 will get more xp
then a level 11 if they team. I dont know if its the same amount
on the yellow bar (since the lev 15 need more xp then the lev 11).

>5. Are there any items I can get on Tunare to raise my intelligence?

*** dont know
>
>6. Are there any quests to become non-PvP?

*** dont know


Vashi


>You have my deepest gratitude in advance for any information.
>
>Rocjaw,
>Son of Halas
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>ONElist: where the world talks!
>http://www.onelist.com
>Join a new list today.
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>For the Honor and Glory of the Warlord, Rallos Zek!
